2054.subject: HPWE
2054.descrlong: Students apply theory to practice in small centerboard type sailboats. Includes maneuvering and driving a boat, rules of the road, nomenclature, knots, developing teamwork, and practicing water and boat safety. A U.S. Sailing certificate course that includes lectures, a written examination, and extensive on-the-water experience. Course fee required. (Offered every semester.)

2064.subject: HPWE
2064.descrlong: Apply theory to practice in small centerboard type sailboats.
